entries.author: Sam
entries.title: First Title
entries.text: We talked about HTML components and how to make grid layouts with Flexbox in CSS.

entries.author: Sam
entries.title: Second Title
entries.text: CSS Grid seems cool. Gotta learn more flexbox, too.

entries.author: Sam
entries.title: Forms, wow
entries.text: Well, it took most of today, but I finally got all the form JS working. I also completely redid the CSS for the journal! This is great! So much better and more responsive. Needs to have the wide-screen layout fixed up though.

entries.author: Sam Edwards
entries.title: Making stuff work
entries.text: After reviewing the code for the view all page, I was able to make the home page show the latest entry.

entries.author: Sam Edwards
entries.title: Arrays fix problems
entries.text: I think I fixed my issue with the journal list not showing the right item. I didn't have it set to the right array.

entries.author: ST Edwards
entries.title: Totals!
entries.text: Somehow, I programmed the totals to show without messing up! Talk about first tries!
